articles.title: NRL 2020: Canberra Raiders v St George Illawarra Dragons round 8 preview - NRL.COM
articles.description: The Canberra Raiders return to familiar surroundings at GIO Stadium to host a Dragons team looking to build on their improved recent form.
articles.content:
The Raiders produced a stirring comeback to force golden point against the Eels but Ricky Stuart wasn't overly impressed with what he witnessed from last year's runners-up.
In contrast, Paul McGrego… [+1678 chars]
